resources.string:
This is the launcher page for Group 7's application. To navigate to the five different sections of the application, select any of the 5 buttons in the action bar above. Each button corresponds to a separate section of the application. These sections include:

 Amazon Price Manager
 Erman Section
 Stuart Section
 Anthony Section
 Joshua Section

 These sections may also be accessed from the bottom bar below.
Guide to using Amazon Price Manager:

The main page has 1 entry field which takes 1 type of search query: an Amazon Item link 
 Links should be formatted such that they appear as:
 https://amazon.ca (com, com.uk, etc.)/dp/itemID 
 For example: https://www.amazon.ca/dp/product/B07SXMZLP9

Any link may be turned into this by stripping off the excess after the item ID in the URL.
 Upon submitting a search query, there will be an attempted connection to server to retrieve the data required.
 One may also access their watchlist using the action button in the bottom left corner of the page.
This button will be used to add to your favourites

Author: Erman Dinsel\nVersion: 2.0\nInstructions: Turn on your location within your Android device\'s settings. When the location prompt shows up, allow the app to use your device\'s location. Now, find a nearby venue on the map and select it. You can view information about the upcoming shows and choose to add that venue to your favourites, which is accessible from the toolbar.
